import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import emailjs from 'emailjs-com' const ContactForm = () => { const { handleSubmit, register, setValue } = useForm() useEffect(() => { register( { name: 'name' } ) register({name: 'email'}) register({name: 'phone_number'}) register({name: 'msg_subject'}) register({name: 'message'}) }, []) const onsubmit = (values)=>{ const { name, email, phone_number, msg_subject, message} = values console.log('v ',values) emailjs.send('Gmail','template_rng2cws', { name, email, phone_number, msg_subject, message, },'user_ojITwwnFvXK7d1iaDiJ2U') .then(function(response) { console.log('SUCCESS!', response.status, response.text); }, function(err) { console.log('FAILED...', err); }); } return (

Let's make your app !

setValue('name', event.target.value, true)} />
setValue('email', event.target.value, true)} />
setValue('phone_number', event.target.value, true)} />
setValue('msg_subject', event.target.value, true)} />
) } export default ContactForm
